short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Those irritating auto-playing videos on News Corp websites have to go. This Extension aims to remove all of them after page load.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The auto-playing videos on News Corp websites are extremely irritating. More often than not if you elect out of the auto-play system the videos will continue to auto-play anyway resulting in a poor user experience.

This extension will wait for the page to finish loading and will attempt to remove all of those video modules from the page. It will leave a note behind to let you know when it has.
